question: You are going to take a short holiday in Singapore and you want to rent a holiday apartment while you are there. Write a letter to the tourist information office. In your letter:-	Explain what you need-	Say when you plan to be there-	Ask for information about prices
text: Hope my letter finds you well.
I am writing this letter to express my interest to rent an apartment during my short holiday in Singapore. Please be informed that I need a whole flat apartment.

Kindly note that my flight will be this coming Monday, 9 in the morning. Thus, I will be at the airport in the evening. However, I need to meet one of my friends first, so, I will be there on the next day, which is Tuesday.

Furthermore, I would like to ask if you could send me the prices of your room per night and what will be the inclusion of those. I appreciated it if you would let me know if you have some promotions that I can avail.
Should you have any concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know. Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
